hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] came from a journey, and I had hung a curtain on which there were images over a niche. He took it down and said: 'The people who will be most severely punished on the Day of Resurrection will be those who try to match the creation of Allah

chapter.eng-name: The People Who Will be Most Severely Punished
